title: Taming Lily
description: Warning: 18+ ONLY This title contains erotic situations and graphic languageThis issue includes all 3 volumes: Blooming Lily, Wild Lily and Taming Lily.In Blooming Lily: Shy, innocent wallflower Lily married Mark as a virgin at eighteen. After five boring years Lily starts a new job that slowly brings her out of her shell. Threatened by the changes in his young wife, Mark treats Lily with distain until she can tolerate no more. Leaving him for a long weekend at a Tropical Resort, Lily opens herself to fun and excitement. Beautiful and sensual Devon takes Lily under her wing and introduces her to the joys and pleasures of her first orgasm. Never realizing that lovemaking could be so much more, Lily heads home to breathe new life into her dull marriage.In Wild Lily:Starting fresh in a life that doesn’t include her insensitive husband, Lily embarks on a journey of sexual pleasure and independence. Throwing herself wide open to all new sexual experiences she discovers that Wild Lily is just what she’s been missing!In Taming Lily:Lily loves her new lifestyle. She has immersed herself in the pleasures of sexual freedom but something always seems to be missing. Unknown to Lily, her husband Mark has taken her advice and learned some interesting life and sex lessons as well. When a chance meeting ignites sparks between them, Lily has to decide if love is what’s keeping her from being truly satisfied and Mark has his work cut out for him in order to win her back. He’ll need all his new sexual experience if he has any chance at Taming Lily.
